items.question: Should your couple have a model appearance?
Will you pay for your partner if he/she loses the income?
Are you ready to date with a person who has a child?
Are you ready to have children?
Would you prefer going out with friends rather then having time with your partner?

answers.text: No, I would stay with my loved one
Yes, I always have fun with friends, not with my partner

results.text: What a pity! You're not ready for some serious relationship yet. You need to reconsider your position.
You're rather stable, however there's still much to do. Don't worry! Now you have time to go out and have fun a lot and maybe you will meet your soulmate.
You are a perfect partner! Every girl dreams about having relationship with you!
